# Note

# Note

Represents an abstract musical note.

Kind: global class

  • Note
    • new Note(attributes)
    • .duration : String
    • .interval(interval)
    • .setDuration(duration) ⇒ Note
    • .setOctave(octave) ⇒ Note
    • .transpose(interval)
    • .toString() ⇒ string

# new Note(attributes)

Param Type Description
attributes Object Object that contains some or all of the following keys:
attributes.pitchClass String one of the pitch classes('c', 'd', etc...)
attributes.octave number note octave
attributes.duration String note duration

Example

const n = new Note({note: 'c', octave: 3, duration: '4n', instrument: 'Piano'})

# note.duration : String

Get the duration of a note

Kind: instance property of Note

# note.interval(interval)

Gets interval size (Number) and returns a new instance of a note which is calculated by the musical interval formula.

Kind: instance method of Note

Param Type Description
interval number Musical Interval

Example

let c = new Note({note:'c', octave:3}) //create a C3 note.
let interval = c.interval(4) //calling the function with the number 4(which is a major third).
console.log(interval.toStrring()) //should output 'E3'.
console.log(interval.constructor.name) //should output Note.

# note.setDuration(duration) ⇒ Note

Returns a new Note with the new duration.

Kind: instance method of Note

Param
duration

# note.setOctave(octave) ⇒ Note

Returns a new Note with the new octave.

Kind: instance method of Note

Param Type
octave Number

# note.transpose(interval)

Alias for interval()

Kind: instance method of Note

Param Type
interval Number

# note.toString() ⇒ string

Returns a string of the note.

Kind: instance method of Note
